ProductInfo.Features:
Extra-large 6GB memory lets you run your most demanding programs.
750GB hard drive holds thousands of songs, photos and documents.
Large 17.3" diagonal LED-backlit TruBrite® display.  LED backlighting permits a thinner and more energy-efficient screen.
Wireless-N (802.11n) for high-performance, cable-free networking.  Lets you access wireless networks to share files, surf the Web and exchange email. Fully compatible with 802.11b/g as well. Wired networking is supported, too.Toshiba Satellite® L75D-A7280 Laptop Computer With 17.3" Screen & AMD A6 Quad-Core Accelerated Processor
